attributes.action: tackle violence by imposing fines and payments for custodial time via compulsory purchase orders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
• A compulsory fine for any violent behaviour from £150.00 up to £400.00. If the attacker does not have the relevant funds, a compulsory sell order of his property / belongings will be issued. * This will make thugs think twice about random violence, especially under the influence of alcohol. 

• If the crime is so severe that a prison sentence is given ~ then the criminal should pay for his / her stay in prison. Again by a compulsory sell order of property / belongings, or on the prisoners release £x amount taking straight from source ~ either their benefit or salary. * This should stop re-offenders as they will soon find out ‘crime does NOT pay’. Also, it could stop the accolade made from young offenders on their return to society.
